survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees about their experience at the event venue, including facilities, services, and overall satisfaction to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness of the venue?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness of the venue?

questions.question_text: Which of the following facilities did you use during the event? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following facilities did you use during the event? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the venue for individuals with mobility challenges?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Not applicable' option for attendees who did not notice or use accessibility features.

script.question_text: How would you rate the accessibility of the venue for individuals with mobility challenges?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future events at this venue?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback; ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future events at this venue?

questions.question_text: Would you attend another event at this venue in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to gauge likelihood of return attendance.

script.question_text: Would you attend another event at this venue in the future?
